16: וְגַ֛ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Also</n> שֹׁל־ <sup>7997 </sup> <n>And let fall</n> תָּשֹׁ֥לּוּ <sup>7997 </sup> <n>of purpose</n> לָ֖הּ מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַצְּבָתִ֑ים <sup>6653 </sup> <n>also [some] of the handfuls</n> וַעֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>5800 </sup> <n>for her and leave</n> וְלִקְּטָ֖ה <sup>3950 </sup> <n>[them] that she may glean</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִגְעֲרוּ־ <sup>1605 </sup> <n>[them] and rebuke</n> בָֽהּ׃
17: וַתְּלַקֵּ֥ט <sup>3950 </sup> <n>So she gleaned</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הָעָ֑רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>until even</n> וַתַּחְבֹּט֙ <sup>2251 </sup> <n>and beat out</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> לִקֵּ֔טָה <sup>3950 </sup> <n>that she had gleaned</n> וַיְהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּאֵיפָ֥ה <sup>374 </sup> <n>and it was about an ephah</n> שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <sup>8184 </sup> <n>of barley</n>
18: וַתִּשָּׂא֙ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And she took [it] up</n> וַתָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and went</n> הָעִ֔יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into the city</n> וַתֵּ֥רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> חֲמוֹתָ֖הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>and her mother in law</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> לִקֵּ֑טָה <sup>3950 </sup> <n>what she had gleaned</n> וַתּוֹצֵא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and she brought forth</n> וַתִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> לָ֔הּ אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> הוֹתִ֖רָה <sup>3498 </sup> <n>to her that she had reserved</n> מִשָּׂבְעָֽהּ׃ <sup>7648 </sup> <n>after she was sufficed</n>
19: וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָ֨הּ חֲמוֹתָ֜הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>And her mother in law</n> אֵיפֹ֨ה <sup>375 </sup> <n>to her Where</n> לִקַּ֤טְתְּ <sup>3950 </sup> <n>unto her Where hast thou gleaned</n> הַיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>to day</n> וְאָ֣נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>and where</n> עָשִׂ֔ית <sup>6213 </sup> <n>wroughtest</n> יְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מַכִּירֵ֖ךְ <sup>5234 </sup> <n>be he that did take knowledge</n> בָּר֑וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>thou? blessed</n> וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>of thee And she shewed</n> לַחֲמוֹתָ֗הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>her mother in law</n> אֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> עָשְׂתָה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>with whom she had wrought</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> שֵׁ֤ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>name</n> הָאִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>The man's</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> עָשִׂ֧יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>with whom I wrought</n> עִמּ֛וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>today</n> בֹּֽעַז׃ <sup>1162 </sup> <n>[is] Boaz</n>
20: וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> נָעֳמִ֜י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>And Naomi</n> לְכַלָּתָ֗הּ <sup>3618 </sup> <n>unto her daughter in law</n> בָּר֥וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> הוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לַיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] he of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> עָזַ֣ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>who hath not left off</n> חַסְדּ֔וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>his kindness</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> הַחַיִּ֖ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>to the living</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>and to</n> הַמֵּתִ֑ים <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and to the dead</n> וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָ֣הּ נָעֳמִ֗י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>And Naomi</n> קָר֥וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] near of kin</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto her The man</n> מִֽגֹּאֲלֵ֖נוּ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>unto us one of our next kinsmen</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
21: וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ר֣וּת <sup>7327 </sup> <n>And Ruth</n> הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֑ה <sup>4125 </sup> <n>the Moabitess</n> גַּ֣ם ׀ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Furthermore</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>He said</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הַנְּעָרִ֤ים <sup>5288 </sup> <n>by my young men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לִי֙ תִּדְבָּקִ֔ין <sup>1692 </sup> <n>unto me also Thou shalt keep fast</n> עַ֣ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> כִּלּ֔וּ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>until they have ended</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַקָּצִ֖יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>all my harvest</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לִֽי׃
22: וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> נָעֳמִ֖י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>And Naomi</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> ר֣וּת <sup>7327 </sup> <n>unto Ruth</n> כַּלָּתָ֑הּ <sup>3618 </sup> <n>her daughter in law</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[It is] good</n> בִּתִּ֗י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>my daughter</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> תֵֽצְאִי֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that thou go out</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> נַ֣עֲרוֹתָ֔יו <sup>5291 </sup> <n>with his maidens</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>so</n> יִפְגְּעוּ־ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>that they meet</n> בָ֖ךְ בְּשָׂדֶ֥ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>field</n> אַחֵֽר׃ <sup>312 </sup> <n>thee not in any other</n>
23: וַתִּדְבַּ֞ק <sup>1692 </sup> <n>So she kept fast</n> בְּנַעֲר֥וֹת <sup>5291 </sup> <n>by the maidens</n> בֹּ֙עַז֙ <sup>1162 </sup> <n>of Boaz</n> לְלַקֵּ֔ט <sup>3950 </sup> <n>to glean</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כְּל֥וֹת <sup>3615 </sup> <n>unto the end</n> קְצִֽיר־ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>harvest</n> הַשְּׂעֹרִ֖ים <sup>8184 </sup> <n>of barley</n> וּקְצִ֣יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>harvest</n> הַֽחִטִּ֑ים <sup>2406 </sup> <n>and of wheat</n> וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> חֲמוֹתָֽהּ׃ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>with her mother in law</n>
